Package Model

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Custom object to track individual Item for sale. Used in ItemManager. Date: 4/20/2019 This is an application that tracks the price of online items.
    Version:
    0.1 CS 3331 Homework 3
    Author:
    MK Babst

        Parameters:
        name - Item name
        price - Item price. Updated in classes priceWatcher and priceFromWeb
        url - can be any string, but must be a proper http if you want access to webpage
        change -
        dateAdded - date added can be any format. dd mmm yyyy is default
        originalPrice -
        source -
